subject: p13849733
Findings: PA and lateral upright chest radiographs were reviewed in comparison to. The right pleural effusion is moderate in size, loculated and unchanged in appearance or minimally decreased since the prior study. The left mediastinal shift is persistent, unchanged. Architectural distortion, bronchiectasis, and pleural thickening in the left upper lobe is unchanged.
